About

Hi there!

My name is Michele.

I’m currently pursuing a PhD within the Department of Geography, King’s College London. At King’s, I’m affiliated with the Geocomputation and the Urban Futures research domains.

I’m passionate about (open)geospatial technologies and their applications to urban environments.

If you want to get in touch just send me an e-mail directly to: michele.ferretti@kcl.ac.uk

Github. Twitter. Linkedin.
